title: EP 121: What's Happening Now Patna?
itunes:title: EP 121: What's Happening Now Patna?
description:
In one of his only interviews, actor Samuel Monroe Jr. stops by. We talk about how his time in juvenile facilities lead to him acting, his wild and crazy times with the late Tupac Shakur, his role in the classic "Menace 2 Society", him over coming his addictions, his love for Nipsey Hussle and much more!

Make sure you follow us on Instagram: @thegangsterchroniclespodcast

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
